items.item_details: Financing Corporation President Pearl Cheng will call the meeting to order and report attendance.

Members of the public who wish to address the Foothill-De Anza Community College District Financing Corporation Board of Directors regarding items not on the agenda may do so at this point in the meeting.  Comments are limited to five minutes per person.
Draft minutes of the December 8, 2014, Foothill-De Anza Community College District Financing Corporation Board of Directors meeting are available using the "View Minutes" link.
items.item_recommendation: Recommendation for approval of the minutes of the December 8, 2014, Financing Corporation meeting.
items.item_text: Minutes of the 12/8/14 Foothill-De Anza Community College District Financing Corporation Board of Directors Meeting
items.item_text_raw: Minutes of the 12/8/14 Foothill-De Anza Community College District Financing Corporation Board of Directors Meeting

items.item_details: The Board of Directors will elect a secretary/treasurer to serve until the December 2015 meeting.
items.item_recommendation: It is recommended that the Board of Directors appoint Chancellor Judy Miner as secretary/treasurer of the Foothill-De Anza Community College District Financing Corporation.

items.item_details: The chair will determine if any other business needs to be conducted.
The next meeting of the Foothill-De Anza Community College District Financing Corporation Board of Directors will be held December 7, 2015.
